title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.2 - Reports of district organization and operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.2 - Reports of district organization and operation

State Regulations
(a) General policy. Social services districts
shall report information on their administrative organization, assignments of
work and authority, staffing, employee compensation and benefits, fee
schedules, operations, productivity, and on other subjects relating to the
administration of social services programs, in the form, content, manner, and
on dates, prescribed by the department. (b) -(c) [Reserved]
(d) Other reports. The social services
district shall submit such other reports as the department may require from
time to time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
